Format Theories:
 MMMMAXBB XEXXVVVV VVVVVVVV CCCCCCCC

 M - Message Type: 0 Regular, 1 Test, 2 ?, 5 Init
 A - Alarm Active
 B - Battery Level
 E - Enable 
 V - Value
 C - Checksum, Sum of first 3 bytes

 01010001 00000000 00111110 10001111 - Init / EN
 00101011 01000000 00000000 01101011  
 00000011 01000000 00000000 01000011 - 000
 00000011 01000000 00101001 01101100 - 041
 00000011 01000000 00000000 01000011 - 000
 00011011 01000000 00000000 01011011 - Test
 00001011 01000010 00000001 01001110 - 513, Alarm
 00000011 01000000 00000100 01000011 - 004?, No alarm

Battery Empty, No Measurements. "Fault" active
 00000000 01000000 00000000 01000000 - 000

Battery 1 Bar, Fault Active
 01010001 00000000 00111110 10001111 - EN
 00101001 01000000 00000000 01101001 - 000
 00001000 01000000 11110100 00111100 - 244
 00000000 01000000 00010111 01010111 - 023
